channel.title: Demise pking source/client help
channel.description:
hello again..
I've got my server + source (demise pking) I need help with this thing:
The whole world is a pk area, but I don't want that. If I can make non-pvp area's I can make a skiller area, because there's no way of making money atm.
And if you kill someone, he doesn't die! he keeps standing and than his hp is restored, but all the items are dropped.
The donator shops have some null's and I don't know how to fix the items...
Anyone who uses thies source/client or anyone who knows how to solve this, help me please
Thanks again

item.title: Demise pking source/client help
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

hello again…

I’ve got my server + source (demise pking)
I need help with this thing:

The whole world is a pk area, but I don’t want that. If I can make non-pvp area’s I can make a skiller area, because there’s no way of making money atm.

And if you kill someone, he doesn’t die! he keeps standing and than his hp is restored, but all the items are dropped.

The donator shops have some null’s and I don’t know how to fix the items…

Anyone who uses thies source/client or anyone who knows how to solve this, help me please

Thanks again
